response.overview: Have you ever felt attracted to someone solely because of their voice? It seduces, it communicates sexual desire, and it all comes from one of the sexiest body parts — the mouth. In this short adult movie, director Aleix Rodón and performers Mar Nantas and Jean Ambar show us the erotic power of a seductive voice.  When Laura (Mar) heads to work for a typical day of dubbing, she's given a less than ordinary assignment: to dub a vintage erotic movie. Whilst playing a femme fatale in an Ancient Roman fantasy film she can’t help but be seduced by her character’s counterpart, which was dubbed by a mystery colleague just moments before her. Seduction turns to longing and her imagination takes over as she imagines the person whose lips had been in front of this mic only minutes before her.
response.title: Dubbing
